original_text: And he dwelleth in desolate cities, and in houses which no man inhabiteth, which are ready to become heaps.
korean_text: 그는 황폐한 성읍, 사람이 살지 아니하는 집, 돌무더기가 될 곳에 거주하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: And he dwelleth in desolate cities
and in houses which no man inhabiteth
which are ready to become heaps
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 무더기가 되기 준비가 되어 있다
